title: The Tribe of Dan and Micah’s Idols
summary: Judges 18 tells how the tribe of Dan steals Micah’s idols and his Levite priest. They attack and take over the city of Laish, renaming it Dan, and set up idol worship there, further spreading corruption.

faq.question: What did the Danites do with Micah’s idols?
faq.answer: They stole them and set up their own idolatrous worship in the city of Dan.

faq.question: What city did they capture and rename?
